conclusion: Analyze wave motion and use given information to determine meeting time.
Wave source at x = -0.2 m moving right, wave source at x = 1.2 m moving left.
Distance between wave sources is 1.2 m - (-0.2 m) = 1.4 m.
Time t = Distance between wave sources / v = 1.4 m / 0.4 m/s = 3.5 s.
Problem involves calculating meeting time based on wave speed, amplitude, and equilibrium positions.
Final answer: Waves meet at t = 3.5 s.
